question: What is 25% of 200?

If the price of an item is $200 and it is sold at a discount of 15%, what is the selling price?

If 80% of A is equal to 60% of B, what is the ratio of A to B?

A man increases his speed by 20% and reaches his destination 1 hour earlier. If the original time was 5 hours, what is the new time?

If a sum of money at simple interest becomes 1.5 times in 5 years, what is the rate of interest per annum?
A sum of money triples itself in 10 years at simple interest. What is the rate per annum?
The price of a shirt is increased by 30% and then decreased by 10%. What is the net percentage change in price?
A student gets 120 marks, which is 80% of total marks. What are the total marks?

A number is 25% less than another number. If the larger number is 160, what is the smaller number?
A sum of money is divided among A, B, C in the ratio 2:3:5. If C gets $500, what is the total sum?
If 10% of a number is 25, what is 15% of the same number?
